content:
Important to get that passport renewed before your international trip!

I've added your Lufthansa flight to your itinerary:

**Flight 1:**

* Airline: Delta
* Departure: March 10th, New York (JFK/LGA/EWR - please specify the exact airport if you know it)
* Destination: Atlanta (ATL)
* Return: March 14th
* Status: Silver Medallion

**Flight 2:**

* Airline: Lufthansa
* Departure: June 1st, New York (JFK/LGA/EWR - please specify the exact airport if you know it)
* Destination: Frankfurt (FRA)
* Return: [Please provide return date and time if booked]
* Note: Passport renewal pending (expires in July)

Remember to prioritize your passport renewal process to ensure you receive your new passport in time for your trip. You can check the US Department of State's website for current processing times and guidelines.

Do you have any other flights or travel plans you'd like to add to your itinerary?
